scripts.build-docs: docker build -t jpez-docs -f Dockerfile.docs . && docker rm -f jpez-docs && docker create --name jpez-docs jpez-docs && docker cp -a jpez-docs:/build-docs .
scripts.run-postgres: docker run -e POSTGRES_USER_FILE=/credentials/user -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD_FILE=/credentials/password -e POSTGRES_DB_FILE=/credentials/db -dp 127.0.0.1:5432:5432 --name jpez-postgres jpez-postgres
scripts.run-headed-postgres: docker run -e POSTGRES_USER_FILE=/credentials/user -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD_FILE=/credentials/password -e POSTGRES_DB_FILE=/credentials/db -p 127.0.0.1:5432:5432 --name jpez-postgres jpez-postgres
scripts.start-headed-postgres: npm run build-postgres && npm run kill-postgres && npm run run-headed-postgres
scripts.start-postgres: npm run build-postgres && npm run kill-postgres && npm run run-postgres
scripts.dump-postgres: docker exec jpez-postgres pg_dump -U root --format custom jpez > "build/postgres/dump.pgdata"
scripts.node-init: docker build -t jpez-node-init -f Dockerfile.node-init . && docker rm -f jpez-node-init && docker create --name jpez-node-init jpez-node-init && docker cp jpez-node-init:/node-init build/
scripts.build-node: npm run node-init && docker build -t jpez-node -f Dockerfile.node .
scripts.start-node: npm run build-node && npm run kill-node && npm run run-node
scripts.start-headed-node: npm run build-node && npm run kill-node && npm run run-headed-node
scripts.start: npm run start-postgres && npm run start-node
scripts.start-headed: npm run start-postgres && npm run start-headed-node
scripts.kill: npm run kill-postgres && npm run kill-node
